div.p: SCROLL, in HERALDRY. See that article, chap. iv, ſect. 9. When the motto relates to the creſt, the ſcroll is properly placed above the atchievement; otherwiſe it ſhould be annexed to the eſcutcheon. Thoſe of the order of knighthood are generally placed round ſhields.
